document_data.name: Gardenia
document_data.mainbody: '''Gardenias''' were flowering plants that grew in [[Cormanthor]], [[Zakhara]], and even the plane of [[Outlands]].
document_data.Use:
Apart from decorative purposes, gardenias were used in [[perfume]]-making. [[Anorrweyn Evensong]] of ancient [[Myth Drannor]] wore gardenia perfume and after her death, her [[ghost]] emitted the same pleasant aroma.

Gardenia aromatic [[oil]]s could cost up to 200 pieces of [[gold]].
document_data.Habitats:
In [[Ysawis]], the City of the Dead of [[Zakhara]], [[undead]] servants tended flower gardens filled with begonias, [[violet]]s, and [[orchid]]s.

[[Damara]]n [[begonia]]s and gardenias were valued as decorative houseplants, seen sold as far as the city of [[Mulmaster]] in the [[Moonsea]].

Outside the [[Prime Material plane]], gardenias grew in the [[Palace of Judgment]], one of the realms in the [[Outlands]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1367 DR]], [[Shafazal's Oasis]] in Zakhara smelled of wild orchids and gardenias.
